statements: SELECT * FROM patient_dna_analysis_results;
SELECT patient_id, dna_sequence FROM patient_dna_analysis_results WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_plan FROM patient_dna_analysis_results WHERE dna_sequence LIKE 'ACGT%';
SELECT treatment_plan, dna_sequence FROM patient_dna_analysis_results ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient_dna_analysis_results;
SELECT * FROM patient_dna_analysis_results WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT patient_id, dna_sequence FROM patient_dna_analysis_results WHERE treatment_plan = 'Precision Medicine'
SELECT DISTINCT treatment_plan FROM patient_dna_analysis_results WHERE LENGTH(dna_sequence) > 1000
SELECT patient_id, dna_sequence FROM patient_dna_analysis_results ORDER BY LENGTH(dna_sequence) DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_dna_analysis_results WHERE patient_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM patient_dna
SELECT patient_id, dna_sequence FROM patient_dna
SELECT patient_id, dna_sequence FROM patient_dna WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans ORDER BY consultation_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, treatment_description FROM treatment_plans WHERE consultation_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM patient_dna WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT plan_id, treatment_description FROM treatment_plans WHERE consultation_date >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS treatment_count FROM treatment_plans GROUP BY patient_id
SELECT * FROM patient_dna JOIN treatment_plans ON patient_dna.patient_id = treatment_plans.patient_id
SELECT patient_id, MAX(consultation_date) AS latest_consultation_date FROM treatment_plans GROUP BY patient_id
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, dna_analysis_result FROM patient_data;
SELECT plan_id, patient_id, treatment_description, date_created FROM treatment_plans;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT record_id, plan_id, blockchain_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_records ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, dna_analysis_result FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT treatment_description, date_created FROM treatment_plans ORDER BY date_created DESC;

SELECT patient_name, blockchain_hash FROM patient_data JOIN treatment_plans ON patient_data.patient_id = treatment_plans.patient_id JOIN blockchain_records ON treatment_plans.plan_id = blockchain_records.plan_id;

SELECT patient_name, dna_analysis_result, treatment_description, date_created FROM patient_data LEFT JOIN treatment_plans ON patient_data.patient_id = treatment_plans.patient_id ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientData;
SELECT patient_id, dna_analysis_result FROM PatientData;
SELECT patient_id, dna_analysis_result FROM PatientData WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM PersonalizedTreatmentPlan ORDER BY treatment_description DESC;
SELECT * FROM BlockchainEcosystem LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM PersonalizedTreatmentPlan;
SELECT treatment_description FROM PersonalizedTreatmentPlan ORDER BY treatment_description DESC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_description FROM PersonalizedTreatmentPlan WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT analysis_results FROM PrecisionMedicineAnalysis WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT block_id, timestamp FROM BlockchainEcosystem ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_plan FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT treatment_date, diagnosis, prescription FROM treatment_history WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT entity_id, entity_type, entity_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_level = 2;
SELECT record_id, block_hash, previous_block_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_records ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT treatment_plan, dna_sequence FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT doctor_id, COUNT(*) FROM doctor_notes GROUP BY doctor_id;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_date, diagnosis FROM treatment_history WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT entity_name, permission_level FROM permissions WHERE entity_type = 'doctor';
